"""
Guest asks about business productivity services and professional amenities in the lounge.
Provide comprehensive information about business facilities, productivity tools, and professional services.

TOOLS: null
"""

system:
Grand Imperial Wellness Resort (hotel_id: giwr_tokyo_bay_01)
Address: 1-1-1 Daiba, Minato-ku, Tokyo 135-0091, Japan
Timezone: Asia/Tokyo

Business Productivity Services:
- Private business lounges with soundproof meeting rooms
- High-speed internet and Wi-Fi connectivity throughout the facility
- Professional printing, scanning, and document services
- Business center with computers, printers, and office equipment
- Private phone booths and video conferencing facilities
- Professional secretarial and administrative support services
- Business document translation and interpretation services
- Corporate event planning and meeting coordination
- Professional presentation and multimedia support
- Business concierge services for corporate needs

Professional Amenities:
- Ergonomic seating and workstations for productivity
- Multiple power outlets and charging stations
- Professional lighting and climate control systems
- Quiet zones for focused work and concentration
- Private meeting rooms with advanced technology
- Business library with reference materials and resources
- Professional coffee and refreshment services
- Business catering and meal services
- Professional cleaning and maintenance services
- Secure storage and document management systems

Technology & Connectivity:
- High-speed fiber internet with dedicated business bandwidth
- Video conferencing systems with HD quality
- Professional audio-visual equipment and support
- Cloud storage and file sharing services
- Mobile device charging and support services
- Professional software and productivity applications
- Secure network access and data protection
- Remote access and virtual office capabilities
- Professional IT support and technical assistance
- Advanced communication systems and services

Meeting & Conference Facilities:
- Private meeting rooms with capacity for 2-20 people
- Conference rooms with presentation equipment
- Boardroom-style meeting spaces with executive amenities
- Breakout rooms for smaller group discussions
- Video conferencing rooms with professional equipment
- Presentation rooms with multimedia capabilities
- Private dining rooms for business meals
- Outdoor meeting spaces with scenic views
- Flexible room configurations and setups
- Professional event coordination and support

- Professional secretarial and administrative assistance
- Document preparation and editing services
- Business research and information services
- Corporate travel planning and coordination
- Professional photography and videography services
- Business document translation and interpretation
- Corporate gift and souvenir services
- Professional cleaning and maintenance services
- Security services and access control
- Professional concierge services for business needs

- Professional office supplies and stationery
- Business reference materials and resources
- Professional software and productivity applications
- Cloud-based collaboration tools and platforms
- Professional printing and binding services
- Document scanning and digitization services
- Professional presentation and multimedia support
- Business card printing and design services
- Professional mailing and shipping services
- Corporate communication and marketing support

Operating Hours: 6:00 AM - 11:00 PM daily
Business Center: 24/7 access for registered guests
Meeting Rooms: Available by reservation
Professional Services: Available during business hours
Technical Support: Available 24/7

assistant channel=analysis:

assistant channel=final:
こんにちは！当ホテルのラウンジでは、包括的なビジネス生産性サービスをご提供しています。防音ミーティングルーム付きプライベートビジネスラウンジ、施設全体の高速インターネットとWi-Fi接続、プロフェッショナル印刷、スキャン、文書サービス、コンピューター、プリンター、オフィス設備付きビジネスセンター、プライベート電話ブースとビデオ会議施設、プロフェッショナル秘書と管理サポートサービス、ビジネス文書翻訳と通訳サービス、企業イベントプランニングとミーティング調整、プロフェッショナルプレゼンテーションとマルチメディアサポート、企業ニーズのためのビジネスコンシェルジュサービスなどが含まれます。

user:

assistant channel=analysis:
ゲストは会議室について詳しく知りたがっている。システムプロンプトのミーティング・会議施設情報を提供する。

assistant channel=final:

user:
営業時間について教えてください。24時間利用できますか？

assistant channel=analysis:
ゲストは営業時間について質問している。システムプロンプトの営業時間・サービス情報を提供する。

assistant channel=final:
ラウンジは毎日午前6時から午後11時まで営業しており、ビジネスセンターは登録ゲスト向けに24時間アクセス可能、ミーティングルームは予約制でご利用いただけます。プロフェッショナルサービスは営業時間中にご利用いただけ、技術サポートは24時間対応いたします。緊急のビジネスニーズには、24時間サポートも提供しています。

user:
ありがとうございます！とても充実したビジネスサービスですね。明日から利用を始めたいと思います。

assistant channel=analysis:
ゲストが感謝の気持ちを表し、明日から利用を始めたいと述べている。簡潔な返答で対応し、今後のサポートを約束する。

assistant channel=final:
どういたしまして！お役に立てて嬉しいです。Grand Imperial Wellness Resortのビジネスラウンジで、効率的で生産性の高いビジネス活動をお楽しみください。明日からのご利用、お待ちしております。何かご不明な点がございましたら、いつでもお気軽にお声かけください。
